tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MusicTheoryExercises(
  exercise_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exercise_topic VARCHAR(50),
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(20),
  question TEXT,
  correct_answer TEXT,
  explanation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE student_progress (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exercise_id INT,
  quiz_id INT,
  completion_status BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (exercise_id) REFERENCES music_exercises(exercise_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (quiz_id) REFERENCES music_quizzes(quiz_id)
);
CREATE TABLE exercises (exercise_id INT PRIMARY KEY, exercise_title VARCHAR(255), exercise_description TEXT, difficulty_level INT)
CREATE TABLE quizzes (quiz_id INT PRIMARY KEY, quiz_title VARCHAR(255), quiz_description TEXT, total_questions INT)
CREATE TABLE questions (question_id INT PRIMARY KEY, question_text TEXT, correct_answer VARCHAR(255), explanation TEXT, quiz_id INT REFERENCES quizzes(quiz_id))
CREATE TABLE answers (answer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, answer_text VARCHAR(255), is_correct BOOLEAN, question_id INT REFERENCES questions(question_id))
CREATE TABLE student_progress (student_id INT, quiz_id INT REFERENCES quizzes(quiz_id), score INT, attempts INT)
